TopicTitle: What topics have you decided to create on the forum, only to change your mind at the last minute?

Articles.Content:
Almost this one.

Edited July 9, 2020 by catloaf

today i was about to make a thread asking for help with parallel lipoly packs that wont explode. but then i found a 10ah battery on ebay, ordered it, and closed my browser. i even had 3 paragraphs up.
I don't recall any threads, but probably half the comments that I fully write, proofread, and edit get deleted because I feel they don't add enough value to the conversation.
